changeSet.author: Pengap
changeSet.comment: 组件包信息表新增is_template、is_enabled、owner字段
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `${table.prefix}widget_package` ADD COLUMN `is_template` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 0 COMMENT '是否模版(0:是,1:否)' AFTER `release_id`, ADD COLUMN `is_enabled` tinyint(1) UNSIGNED NOT NULL DEFAULT 1 COMMENT '是否启用，只针对全局小组件(0:关闭,1:开启)' AFTER `is_template`, ADD COLUMN `owner` bigint NULL DEFAULT NULL COMMENT '拥有者Id(关联#vika_user#id)' AFTER `is_deleted`;

changeSet.author: Pengap
changeSet.sql: ALTER TABLE `${table.prefix}widget_package_auth_space` ADD COLUMN `widget_sort` int UNSIGNED NULL DEFAULT 10000 COMMENT '排序号，空间站小组件从10000开始' AFTER `type`;
